short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sidekick is a smart crypto wallet that gives you superpowers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With smart features like auto-gas, auto-cancel, auto-speedup, optional auto-signing and more, Sidekick Wallet helps you complete your transactions while also saving gas. Sidekick deftly handles multi-wallet minting so you can control multiple wallets simultaneously, minting and speeding up as a group or individually, and with listing sniper capabilities you can be sure to always purchase your desired NFTs.
